Posts.Content: I too am on Teva, on it for about 3 months now. I have horrendous pains in my legs and my knuckle joints are so painful I can hardly bend them. Feel I have aged 20 years since I have been taking this drug. I feel so fed up with these awful side effects, am considering not taking them at all. I can hardly walk some days with the pain and am so tired all the time.
Posts.Title: letrozole and side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks, I will try and get some of the gel from my GP.Hopefully this will help. I have an appointment in a couple of weeks with my oncologist so here's hoping she will be able tofind a solution . Diane xx
Posts.Title: letrozole and side effects

Posts.Content: I had a WLE and axillary clearance in May and have just finished my chemo on Friday. I too have to have anther op next month to achieve clear margins as my tumour was bigger than first thought ie 35mm (originally told 20mm ) Of the24 lymph nodes removed 19 were found to contain cancer. Following surgery I will also be having Rads x15. I wish you well for your surgery, mine wasn't as bad as I feared. Sending you hugs, Diane xx
Posts.Title: Further surgery for 'wider margins' and more lymph nodes to be re

Posts.Content: Brilliant news, i too had the same good news following my 1st mammogram on June 20th. I was lucky to be told the good news there and then. It has been a long hard year of treatment,surgery x2, chemo and Rads. It is a wonderful feeling to get such great news isn't it ? I too echo your sentiments to all on their journey, Good luck and plenty of hugs to all. Diane xx
Posts.Title: First Review Mammogram - It Can Be Done - Success! Yippeee

Posts.Content: Well done ! I am starting my chemotherapy on Thursday and am terrified ! So glad I found this site as everyone is so supportive.Thanks for the hugs, I need them. Â
Posts.Title: Outrageous!

Posts.Content: I did change my BCN and so glad I did. I now have a wonderful supportive nurse who totally gets me as a person.My first one and I did not gel at all, no ones fault just one of those things. Fortunately all 3 BCN's all work with both consultants. Take care of you xx
Posts.Title: Can I change my Macmillan breast nurse?

Posts.Content: Hi, I was called back for a repeat mammogram. I then had a needle biopsy and 3 biopsies from my breast there and then. An appointment was given for the following week when I was given the results and seen by my surgeon and BCN and given a date for my surgery. Hope all goes well for you, the waiting is hard. I was lucky that things moved along quickly for me. Sending hugs,xx
Posts.Title: Undiagnosed and waiting………..

Posts.Content: Hi Vicki, I had 3 FEC and have had 4 of 9 Taxol. I am having the treatment weekly on the NHS. The side effects are not as bad as FEC, just different ! After the 1st one I had terrible muscle and joint pains, which I managed with Paracetamol. This has improved with each treatment. Hope this helps, here if you need any more info. Diane x
Posts.Title: Paclitaxel - TAXOL

Posts.Content: Hi Kate, I too finally took the plunge yesterday ! My daughter and my best friend held my hands while my hairdresser shaved it off ! I cried throughout but now am so glad I took charge as it was awful that it was coming out in handfuls.I had my 2nd FEC on Friday so haven' been out yet as have the dreaded headache and constipation again. Love and hugs, Diane xx
Posts.Title: well I finally did it! !

Posts.Content: Hi Kate , lovely to hear from you. It was good for me too to feel I was not alone, I have a wig but I don't think I will wear it that much as I am not that bothered now that my hair has finally gone ! As you say as long as it kicks cancers ass,that is all I want.I had my 2nd FEC on Friday and am not feeling good at the moment. Will sign off for now. Take care, speak soon, hugs, Diane x
Posts.Title: well I finally did it! !

Posts.Content: Hi there, my 1st treatment tomorrow, feeling so scared ! Finding this site has been so helpful. Everyone is so positive and helpful. I think when I get the 1st one over with I will feel so much better.Will let you all know how I get on.
Posts.Title: 1st Chemotherapy tomorrow !
